verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Corners <S%G1137><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Holding <S%G2902><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Winds <S%G417><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> No <S%G3361><s%> Might Blow <S%G4154><s%> Wind <S%G417><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> Any <S%G3956><s%> Tree. <S%G1186><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Saw <S%G1492><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Having Ascended <S%G305><s%> From The <S%G575><s%> Rising <S%G395><s%> Of The Sun, <S%G2246><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> The Seal <S%G4973><s%> Of God The <S%G2316><s%> Living; <S%G2198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Cried <S%G2896><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> It Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> To Injure <S%G91><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Injure Not <S%G91><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Trees, <S%G1186><s%> <S%G891><s%> Until <S%G3739><s%> We Seal <S%G4972><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Of Our God <S%G2257><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3359><s%> Their Foreheads. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Heard <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Number <S%G706><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sealed, <S%G4972><s%> ' One Hundred And Forty - Four <S%G1540><s%> <S%G5062><s%> <S%G5064><s%> Thousand, <S%G5505><s%> Sealed <S%G4972><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of The Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Israel; <S%G2474><s%>

Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Judah, <S%G2448><s%> ' Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Sealed; <S%G4972><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Reuben, <S%G4502><s%> ' Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Sealed; <S%G4972><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Gad, <S%G1045><s%> ' Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Sealed; <S%G4972><s%>

Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Asher, <S%G768><s%> ' Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Sealed; <S%G4972><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Nephtali, <S%G3508><s%> ' Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Sealed; <S%G4972><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Manasseh, <S%G3128><s%> ' Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Sealed; <S%G4972><s%>

Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Simeon, <S%G4826><s%> ' Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Sealed; <S%G4972><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Levi, <S%G3017><s%> ' Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Sealed; <S%G4972><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Issachar, <S%G2466><s%> ' Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Sealed; <S%G4972><s%>

Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Zebulun, <S%G2194><s%> ' Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Sealed; <S%G4972><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> ' Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Sealed; <S%G4972><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Tribe <S%G5443><s%> Of Benjamin, <S%G958><s%> ' Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Sealed; <S%G4972><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Saw, <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Great, <S%G4183><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> To Number <S%G705><s%> It <S%G846><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%>, Was Able, <S%G1410><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Nation <S%G1484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tribes, <S%G5443><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peoples, <S%G2992><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tongues, <S%G1100><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb, <S%G721><s%> Clothed With <S%G4016><s%> Robes <S%G4749><s%> White, <S%G3022><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Palms <S%G5404><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Their Hands; <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Crying <S%G2896><s%> With A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud, <S%G3173><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> To Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Sits <S%G2521><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Throne <S%G2362><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Of Our God <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb. <S%G721><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Stood <S%G2476><s%> Around <S%G2945><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Four <S%G5064><s%> Living Creatures, <S%G2226><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> Their, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Worshipped <S%G4352><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answered <S%G611><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders, <S%G4245><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%>, To Me, <S%G3427><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Are Clothed With <S%G4016><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Robes <S%G4749><s%> <S%G3588><s%> White, <S%G3022><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Are They, <S%G1526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Whence <S%G4159><s%> Came They? <S%G2064><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Said <S%G2046><s%> To Him, My <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Knowest. <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Me, <S%G3427><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Washed <S%G4150><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4749><s%> Their Robes, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Made White <S%G3021><s%> Robes <S%G4749><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blood <S%G129><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb. <S%G721><s%>

Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Are They <S%G1526><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Serve <S%G3000><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3485><s%> His Temple; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Sits <S%G2521><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> Shall Tabernacle <S%G4637><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> They Shall Not Hunger <S%G3983><s%> Any More, <S%G2089><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> Shall They Thirst <S%G1372><s%> Any More, <S%G2089><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> At All <S%G3361><s%> Shall Fall <S%G4098><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun, <S%G2246><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Any <S%G3956><s%> Heat; <S%G2738><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lamb <S%G721><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> In The Midst <S%G303><s%> Of The <S%G3319><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> Will Shepherd <S%G4165><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Lead <S%G3594><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> Living <S%G2198><s%> Fountains <S%G4077><s%> Of Waters, <S%G5204><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Wipe Away <S%G1813><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Tear <S%G1144><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> Their Eyes. <S%G846><s%>
